attributes.action: make the playing of "White Wedding" mandatory at all wedding ceremonies in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that Billy Idol's song "White Wedding" should be required by law to be played at all wedding ceremonies in the UK, both secular and non-secular. Consideration should also be given to the hairstyle of the person presiding over the ceremony and should resemble Billy Idol's as closely as possible.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
